item.title: Go Race Detector
item.description: Setting Up and Using the Go Race Detector The Go race detector is a powerful tool for identifying race conditions in concurrent Go programs. Race conditions occur when two or more goroutines access shared data concurrently, and at least one of the accesses is a write. This article will guide you through setting up the Go race detector and provide a sample race condition example. Prerequisites Before you begin, ensure you have the following:
